meanings.sent1: The unabsorbent cloth repelled all attempts to soak it up.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel, being unabsorbent, simply let the spilled water pool on top.
meanings.sent3: The unabsorbent sponge seemed to mock the spilled juice, refusing to take it in.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an unabsorbent surface, deflecting any new information that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The unabsorbent material was like a shield against the liquid, keeping it at bay.

meanings.definition: Not able to soak up liquid.
meanings.sent1: The unabsorbent sponge just pushed the water around without soaking any up.
meanings.sent2: The unabsorbent fabric of the raincoat left the raindrops rolling off its surface.
meanings.sent3: The unabsorbent paper towel was like a trampoline for the spilled milk, bouncing it back up.
meanings.sent4: His unabsorbent skin seemed to repel the lotion, leaving it sitting on top like a film.
meanings.sent5: The unabsorbent ground turned the rain into little puddles that refused to seep in.

meanings.sent1: The unabsorbent material of the umbrella kept the raindrops from penetrating through.
meanings.sent2: The unabsorbent surface of the table made it easy to wipe away any spilled drinks.
meanings.sent3: The unabsorbent plant leaves seemed to dance with joy as the rain slid off them.
meanings.sent4: Her unabsorbent hair seemed to defy the humidity, staying perfectly dry and styled.
meanings.sent5: The unabsorbent barrier held strong against the flood, keeping the room dry and safe.
